field.name: YjK2SliderFields][showSliderOn
field.label: Where to display the slider?
field.description: You can display slider in item view , category list view or both

field.name: YjK2SliderFields][disablek2image
field.label: Disable k2 image in item view
field.description: Disable k2 image in item view

field.name: YjK2SliderFields][disablek2imagecat
field.label: Disable k2 image in category view
field.description: Disable k2 image in category list view

field.name: YjK2SliderFields][slider_width
field.label: Slider width
field.description: Enter slider width. You can use px or percentage. If percentage is used, slider will be automatically responsive. If px is used, you will have to add your own responsive css.

field.name: YjK2SliderFields][slider_height
field.label: Slider height
field.description: Enter slider height. Note, do not use percentage for height , px only. If slider width is percentage , the height will auto adjust.

field.name: YjK2SliderFields][visibleItems
field.label: Thumbnail scroll start after image?
field.description: Thumbnail scroll is function that will scroll to next thumb. Please note that images sequence starts from 0. Count is 0 = 1 , 1 = 2, 2 = 3 and so on. Optimal setting with 4 thumbs visible and 8 images to slide would be 3

field.name: YjK2SliderFields][thumb_resize
field.label: Thumbnail image resize
field.description: If set to yes , thumbnail image will take the size of the thumbnail container. This might cause image distortion. If set to no , portion of the image will be used as thumbnail.

field.name: YjK2SliderFields][sliderLocation
field.label: Slider location
field.description: Select the default slider location on K2 item view. If you are using embed in content option please remember to add string {yjk2slider} inside your item text.
